pages.text: The Living Staff is a conduit for botanical magic, crafted from living wood that maintains a connection to natural energies. It bonds with magical essences, allowing for repeated spellcasting.

Unlike direct essence casting, which consumes the essence, the Living Staff preserves the essence's power through a magical bond, enabling multiple uses of the same spell.$(br2)A staff can hold multiple essences, though only one can be active at a time.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Creating a Living Staff requires special wood infused with magical properties and various arcane components to create the bonding matrix.

pages.title: Using the Staff
pages.text: To graft an essence to your staff, hold the essence and right-click while holding the staff.$(br2)To cast the active spell, simply right-click with the staff.$(br2)To switch between grafted spells, sneak and scroll with the mouse wheel.

pages.title: Advanced Staves
pages.text: As your botanical magic skills grow, you may discover ways to enhance your staff with more spell slots or specialized enchantments to boost specific types of magic.$(br2)Some rare materials can create staves with unique properties.
